sub = pd.read_csv('../input/plant-pathology-2020-fgvc7/sample_submission.csv')
sub1 = pd.read_csv('../input/plant-best-sub/resources/submission1.csv')
sub2 = pd.read_csv('../input/plant-best-sub/resources/submission2.csv')
sub3 = pd.read_csv('../input/plant-best-sub/resources/submission3.csv')

sub.healthy = (sub1.healthy + sub2.healthy + sub3.healthy)/3
sub.multiple_diseases = (sub1.multiple_diseases + sub2.multiple_diseases + sub3.multiple_diseases)/3
sub.rust = (sub1.rust + sub2.rust + sub3.rust)/3
sub.scab = (sub1.scab + sub2.scab + sub3.scab)/3
